UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

points.description: The user's total accumulated intel points.

ageVerified.description: Indicates if the user has verified they are over 18.

fantasyEnabled.description: Indicates if the user has accepted the fantasy disclaimer.

totalFantasyScore.description: The user's aggregate score across all fantasy games.

watchlist.description: An array of movie IDs the user has saved.

isAdmin.description: Indicates if the user has administrator privileges.

Article.title: Article
Article.description: Represents a single news article or blog post.

CricketerProfile.title: Cricketer Profile
CricketerProfile.description: Stores the static profile data for a cricketer.

TeamProfile.title: Team Profile
TeamProfile.description: Stores the static profile data for a cricket team (both IP and National).

industry.description: The film industry the movie belongs to.

Star.title: Star
Star.description: Represents a movie star, director, or other key film professional.

profession.description: The primary role of the person (e.g., Actor, Director, Music Director).

specialization.description: Areas of expertise or genres (e.g., Action, Romance, Playback Singer).

AdPlacement.title: Ad Placement
AdPlacement.description: Represents a single advertisement slot in the application.

name.description: The descriptive name of the ad slot (e.g., 'Home Page Sidebar').

page.description: The page or area where the ad appears (e.g., 'Home').

active.description: Whether the ad placement is currently enabled.

FanRating.title: Fan Rating
FanRating.description: Represents a single rating submitted by a fan for a player or team.

userId.description: The UID of the user who submitted the rating.

entityId.description: The ID of the cricketer or team being rated.

ratings.description: A map of attribute names to scores (e.g., {'Batting': 8.5}).

FantasyCampaign.title: Fantasy Campaign
FantasyCampaign.description: Represents a long-running fantasy game for a single movie's entire lifecycle.

title.description: The title of the fantasy campaign (e.g., 'Devara: Part 1 - The Full Campaign').

movieId.description: The ID of the movie this campaign is for.

movieLanguage.description: The primary language of the movie for this campaign.

PredictionEvent.title: Prediction Event
PredictionEvent.description: A specific, time-bound prediction challenge within a Fantasy Campaign.

title.description: e.g., '24-Hour Trailer Views Prediction' or 'Opening Day Box Office'.

eventType.description: The type of prediction the user needs to make.

endTime.description: The deadline for users to lock in their predictions.

UserPrediction.title: User Prediction
UserPrediction.description: A user's specific entry for a Prediction Event.

predictionData.description: Flexible field to store the user's prediction (e.g., {'predictedViews': 25000000} or {'draftedPlayerId': 's1'}).

score.description: The points awarded for this specific prediction after the event is completed.

FantasyMatch.title: Fantasy Match
FantasyMatch.description: Represents a single, live fantasy cricket match event.

FantasyRoleSelection.title: Fantasy Role Selection
FantasyRoleSelection.description: Stores a user's selected roles for a specific innings of a match.

LivePrediction.title: Live Prediction
LivePrediction.description: A single live prediction question within a fantasy match.

UserLivePrediction.title: User Live Prediction
UserLivePrediction.description: A user's answer to a live prediction question.

FantasyStreak.title: Fantasy Streak
FantasyStreak.description: Tracks a user's correct prediction streak for a match.

FantasyLeaderboard.title: Fantasy Leaderboard
FantasyLeaderboard.description: Stores the rankings for a specific fantasy match.

/articles/{articleId}.description: Stores all articles for the Intel Hub.

/cricketers/{cricketerId}.description: Stores base profile information for individual cricketers.

/teams/{teamId}.description: Stores base profile information for teams (IP and National).

/ad-placements/{placementId}.description: Stores all advertisement placements for the app.

/ratings/{ratingId}.description: Collection of all individual fan ratings for players and teams.

/fantasy-campaigns/{campaignId}.description: Stores all available fantasy movie campaigns.

/prediction-events/{eventId}.description: Stores all prediction events tied to fantasy campaigns.

/user-predictions/{predictionId}.description: Stores all user-submitted predictions for events.

/fantasy_matches/{matchId}.description: Stores all available live fantasy cricket matches.

/fantasy_roles/{selectionId}.description: Stores users' role selections for each innings.

/fantasy_predictions/{predictionId}.description: Collection of all live prediction questions for matches.

/fantasy_user_predictions/{answerId}.description: Stores user answers to live prediction questions.

/fantasy_streaks/{userId}_{matchId}.description: Tracks individual user streaks per match.

/fantasy_leaderboards/{matchId}.description: Stores the leaderboard for each fantasy match.
